item.description:
***There is no Organizer or Event Host for this event.***

Also Please consider stopping by the Annual SuphaFans Pub crawl around Fenway Park before, during or after the Futures Games. 

For the 6th year in a row the Boston Red Sox will proudly host the 5th Annual Futures at Fenway minor league doubleheader on Saturday, August 20, at 1pm.

Minor league baseball's stars of tomorrow will once again be playing minor league games at Fenway Park. Game One will feature the AA affiliate Portland Sea Dogs taking on the Binghamton Mets from the Mets organization. The second game will showcase the AAA Pawtucket Red Sox playing the Syracuse Chiefs of the Washington Nationals organization.

The afternoon of baseball will allow fans to enjoy moderate ticket prices, discounted concessions and a fun-filled family atmosphere including autograph sessions and on-field promotions.

Ticket prices start at $5.00. Single Admission ticket will be honored for both games.

Tickets are available to the general public on www.redsox.com on Saturday, February 12, at 10am.

Please RSVP when you purchase your tickets. If any one would like to buy a small block of tickets for members to attend please do and notify the Organizers.
item.why: Jon is an expert on Player Development.
item.name: 5th Annual Futures at Fenway Minor League Doubleheader
